Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 17 Piercing plus 4 Cold
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 15 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon can use its Frightful Presence.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its bite and two with its claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that is aware of the Dragon must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 3: Cold Breath, The Dragon exhales ice in a cone.  Each creature caught in the cone takes an Average 54 Cold damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Ice Walk, The Dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check.  Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement
Abilities.Ability 2: Legendary Resistance, If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Detect, The Dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Attack, The Dragon makes a Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Wing Attack, The Dragon beats its wings.  Nearby creatures make a Dexterity saving throw, failing they take an Average 13 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.  The Dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed

Lair Actions.Action 1: Freezing fog fills a sphere, heavily obscuring the area.  Each creature caught in the area when it appears makes a Constitution saving throw, taking an Average 10 Cold damage.  Creatures that stay in the fog take additional damage at the end of their turn
Lair Actions.Action 2: Jagged ice shards fall from the ceiling, striking creatures underneath them.  A hit target takes an Average 10 Piercing
Lair Actions.Action 3: An opaque wall of ice is created.  When the wall appears, each creature is pushed to either side of the wall
